comments.raw_text: Hotmail, eBay, Find A Grave etc. everything! Don't know how to get a sample picture to you. One other thing when I put the curser over I periodically Get a prompt the the display of the single image or all images on the page can be improved by clicking Shift +A or +S. This works but is pain in the ass when this should just load clear the start with.
